name: Zipper Purse - In 1970's Red Flowerpot Print
description:
ON SALE 50% OFF

This is not your average zipper purse!

Made from a vintage 1970â€™s flowerpot print on the front, it features a denim tab with a vintage button and a bound zipper.

The back is denim and the lining is 100% cotton. It also includes a layer of wadding and woven interfacing for structure and a bit of padding.

It is generously sized to carry all your everyday essentials or whatever else you might like to put in it.

Internal dimensions
Width - 22cm (8.66inches) at the top of the purse
Height - 14cm (5.51) high
